text: A Denny Hulme Memorial Trophy is named in honour of Denny Hulme, a successful racing driver from New Zealand who died in 1992; trophies include: * Denny Hulme Memorial Trophy (Targa Tasmania), awarded at the end of the Targa Tasmania rally * NZ Motor Cup: Denny Hulme Memorial Trophy, awarded in the Toyota Racing Series
title: Denny Hulme Memorial Trophy
